title: Ambassador Transit Lounge
description: Ambassador Transit Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge (near F gates), Level 3, Transit Area, open 24 hours. For more information, please call (65) 6543 8138.

title: British Airways Lounge
description: British Airways Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3. British Airways First and Club World, BA Executive Club Gold and Silver members and eligible members of Oneworld partners. Operating Hours: 3.00pm - 11.00pm daily.

title: Dnata, SATS Premier, Ambassador Lounges
description: Dnata Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, open 24 hours. Garuda Indonesia Business Class Passenger and Economy Passenger holding Platinum Frequent Flyer. Qatar Airways Business Class Passenger and Economy Passenger holding Gold and Silver card. SriLankan Airlines Business Class Passenger and Economy Passenger holding Gold Frequent Flyer. Veloce Logistics.

title: Ambassador Transit Lounge
description: Ambassador Transit Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, Transit Area, open 24 hours. For more information, please call (65) 6543 8138.

title: Qantas, Thai Airways, SATS, Cathay Pacific Lounges
Thai Airways Royal Orchid Lounge
description: Thai Airways Royal Orchid Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3. Access for Thai Airways (Business Class & ROP Platinum & Gold Card Members), Star Alliance Gold Card Members (Holding Star Alliance carriers' same day boarding pass only), BKK Elite Card Holders. Operating hours: 5.30am - 7.45am, 10.15am - 8.30pm (subject to fit schedule changes).

title: SATS Premier Lounge
description: SATS Premier Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, open 24 hours. Access for Air China, Air Niugini, China Southern Airlines, Japan Airlines, Lion Air, Myanmar Airways, Philippines Airlines (Business Class/ Gold Card Members), Turkish Airlines, Xiamen Airlines, Biman Bangladesh International, Uzbekistan Airways, Shenzhen Airlines, Regent Airways passengers.

title: SATS Premier Lounge
description: SATS Premier Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, open 24 hours. Access for Air India (Business Class), Etihad Airways (Business Class / Gold Card Members), Korean Air (First Class, Business Class / Frequent Flyer card members), Lao Airlines, Malaysia Airlines (Business Class / Gold Card Members), Royal Brunei Airlines (Business Class / Gold Card Members).

title: Singapore Airlines SilverKris Lounge
description: SIA SilverKris Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, open 24 hours. All Star Alliance (First Class / Business Class), SilkAir Business Class and Economy Class Passengers holding PPS Membership Card, Singapore Airlines First and Business Class, and Economy Class Passengers holding PPS Membership Card.

title: Singapore Airlines SilverKris Lounge
description: SIA SilverKris Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, open 24 hours. All Star Alliance (First Class / Business Class), SilkAir Business Class and Economy Class Passengers holding PPS Membership Card, Singapore Airlines First and Business Class, and Economy Class Passengers holding PPS Membership Card.

title: Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer Gold Lounge
description: KrisFlyer Gold Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3, open 24 hours. For KrisFlyer Elite Gold Members and Star Alliance Gold Members departing on SIA or Star Alliance flights. Virgin Atlantic Flying Club Gold Card holders travelling on Singapore Airlines.

title: Qantas Singapore Lounge
description: Qantas Singapore Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3. Eligible members of Oneworld partners and Emirates Skywards. Operating Hours: 2.30pm - 11.00pm daily.

title: Emirates Lounges
description: Emirates Lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 3. Access for Emirates First and Business Class, Platinum & Gold Skywards members on Emirates and Qantas flights (Exclude EK codeshare flights) Operating hours: 6.30am - 10.00am, 12.00pm - 3.30pm, 6.00pm - 1.40am.

title: Skyview Lounge
description: Sky View lounge is located at the Departure Transit Lounge, Level 2, open 24 hours. Access is for Business Class Passengers/ Frequent Flyer Card Members of: Cathay Pacific, Air France & KLM Royal Dutch, Air Mauritius, Delta Airlines, Bangkok Airways, Air China, Finnair, Priority Pass members, Airport Angels members, Dragon Pass members, Diners Club members, One World Alliance Card Holders (invitational Emerald, Sapphire & Ruby Card Holders).

title: Business Center
description: Business Centers provide services like typing, mailing of documents, and 24-hour photocopying and faxing. Terminal 1 at Transit Hotel, Departure Transit Lounge East, Level 3, Transit Area. Open 24 hours daily. For more information, please call (65) 6542 5538

title: Business Center
description: Business Centers provide services like typing, mailing of documents, and 24-hour photocopying and faxing. Terminal 2 at Transit Hotel, Departure Transit Lounge South, Level 3, Transit Area. Open 24 hours daily. For more information, please call (65) 6542 8122

title: Business Center
description: Business Centers provide services like typing, mailing of documents, and 24-hour photocopying and faxing. Terminal 3 at Transit Hotel, Departure Transit Lounge North, Mezzanine level, Transit Area. Open 24 hours daily. For more information, please call (65) 6507 9788

title: Kinetic Rain
description: Kinetic Rain. Stand mesmerized by the dance of 1,216 polished copper raindrops. The art installation depicts the joy of traveling and is Terminal 1's centerpiece.

title: Cactus Garden
description: Cactus Garden. Visit this rooftop garden of over 40 species of cacti and succulents from Africa and the Americas. Chill out at the bar with cocktails and beers before your flight.

title: Swimming Pool
description: Swimming Pool. Take a dip in this Balinese-themed rooftop pool as you watch planes take off from the runway.

title: Orchid Garden
description: Orchid Garden. Brighten up your journey with a colourful collection of rare orchids. Dendrobium Changi Airport and Singapore's national flower, Vanda Miss Joaquim, make seasonal appearances too.

title: Sunflower Garden
description: Sunflower Garden. Let 500 bright yellow flowers bring cheer to you. Then, admire the majestic view of the runway and aircraft parking bays from this rooftop haven.

title: Enchanted Garden
description: Enchanted Garden. Be captivated as this interactive and decorative garden of glass and mosaic sculptures comes to life with sights and sounds triggered by motion.

title: Entertainment Deck
description: Entertainment Deck. From Xbox 360 and Kinect stations to a movie theatre, it's your one-stop multimedia entertainment centre with thrills for everyone.

title: Movie Theatre
description: Movie Theatre. Catch the latest blockbusters for free at this 24-hour movie theatre. Suitable for all ages, our movies will provide family entertainment for hours.

title: Koi Pond
description: Koi Pond. Admire the beautiful fishes as they swim around gracefully and pick up some knowledge on Kois. Let your kids feed the Kois during feeding time.

title: Butterfly Garden
description: Butterfly Garden. The first butterfly garden in an airport is home to over 1,000 butterflies. Learn about their life cycle at the educational corners and individual enclosures.

title: The Slide @ T3
description: The Slide @ T3. Take a ride on the world's tallest slide in an airport. At 12 metres high, shriek your way down while reaching speeds of up to 6 metres per second.

title: Baggage Claim
description: To find out which carousel is assigned to your flight, please check the nearby information displays. There are also free trolleys prepared for you. Airport offers free porter service to move your baggage within the airport's public areas and also a temporary storage for your baggage.

title: Baggage Claim
description: To find out which carousel is assigned to your flight, please check the nearby information displays. There are also free trolleys prepared for you. Airport offers free porter service to move your baggage within the airport's public areas and also a temporary storage for your baggage.

title: Baggage Claim
description: To find out which carousel is assigned to your flight, please check the nearby information displays. There are also free trolleys prepared for you. Airport offers free porter service to move your baggage within the airport's public areas and also a temporary storage for your baggage.

title: Baggage Claim
description: To find out which carousel is assigned to your flight, please check the nearby information displays. There are also free trolleys prepared for you. Airport offers free porter service to move your baggage within the airport's public areas and also a temporary storage for your baggage.

title: Baggage Claim
description: To find out which carousel is assigned to your flight, please check the nearby information displays. There are also free trolleys prepared for you. Airport offers free porter service to move your baggage within the airport's public areas and also a temporary storage for your baggage.

title: Simple Eats
description: Simple Eats opens the first of a series of _fast-casual” dining concept that grew from one simple idea: making great quality comfort food accessible to all people at reasonable prices. Simple Eats | The Thai Noodle Bar will offer a menu filled with Thai street food classics like Tom Yum Noodles, Yen Ta Fo (Pink Noodles), Pa-Lo Chicken (Five Spice Stew) and Green Curry with Fish Balls.

title: Quiznos
description: Arrivals level. If you're looking for a healthy meal with low fat choices, pop by Quiznos for a satisfying experience. Quiznos uses only fresh, quality ingredients in its great tasting salads and sandwiches.

title: Starbucks
description: Sometimes, all you need is that familiar taste of your favourite cup of coffee _ and that is exactly what Starbucks delivers all over the world, and here at Changi Airport too. Discover the world of coffee with a fresh cuppa brewed with the best Arabica beans from Latin America, Africa and Asia Pacific. A delightful selection of juices, cakes and pastries are also available. They are the perfect light bites before you travel. Disclaimer: Stores at Changi Airport, with the exception of Terminal 1 Arrival Hall, are unable to accept use of the Starbucks Card.

title: Delifrance
description: With the aroma of freshly baked croissants and coffee wafting through the air, it is impossible to resist stopping by Delifrance. This authentic french caf_ bakery serves freshly baked breads and pastries like tarts, quiches, puff pastries and croissants, along with a tasty menu of soups and salads. Those with an appetite should try a croissant or baguette with delicious seafood or chicken fillings.

title: Krispy Kreme
description: Krispy Kreme is an international retailer of premium-quality sweet treats, including its signature Original Glazed doughnut. Headquartered in Winston-Salem, N.C., the Company has offered the highest-quality doughnuts and great-tasting coffee since 1937. Today, Krispy Kreme can be found in over 800 locations in over 20 countries around the world.

title: Dunkin Donuts
description: 52 varieties of irresistible donuts are made fresh every day at Dunkin' Donuts. Choose from the signature Boston Kreme donut, classic sugar-raised donuts, donuts filled with scrumptious jams, or donuts dipped in chocolate and covered with nuts. There are also the delicate Munchkins that are loved by the young and the young at heart. In addition, a wide range of coffee and beverages as well as bagels, sandwiches, wraps are available to satiate your cravings.

title: Panopolis Cafe and Bakery
description: Panopolis offers delicious sandwiches and pastries inspired by flavours from around the world. All breads are freshly baked with the finest ingredients and topped up throughout the day. Pop by to pick up a tasty treat for your flight ahead.

title: Costa Coffee
description: Keeping true to its Italian heritage since 1971, each cup of Costa Coffee is made using a special blend of Mocha Italia beans that have been slow-roasted in the Costa Roastery in London and skillfully handcrafted by Costa's passionate baristas. Costa is also dedicated to serving only the highest quality food and providing top-notch service to complete your coffee experience.

title: Aerotel Transit Hotel
description: Aerotel Transit Hotel is at Level 3 Departure Transit Lounge (above Gate D41), open 24 hours daily. Tel: +65 6808 2388, Email: rsvn.sin@myaerotel.com

title: Ambassador Transit Hotel
description: Ambassador Transit Hotel is located at Level 3, Departure Transit Lounge (above Orchid Garden), open 24 hours. The Ambassador Transit Hotels are equipped with a host of facilities that provide passengers with everything they need to have a comfortable stay. Tel: +65 6542 8122. Email: enquiry@harilelahospitality.com

title: Crowne Plaza Changi Airport Hotel
description: Crowne Plaza Changi Airport @ T3 promises you comfort, luxury and more. Located at 75 Airport Boulevard #01-01 Singapore 819664. 1800 787 1221 or visit us at www.crowneplaza.com

title: Ambassador Transit Hotel
description: Ambassador Transit Hotel is located at Level 3, Departure Transit Lounge (next to Movie Theatre), open 24 hours. 24 hours. The Ambassador Transit Hotels are equipped with a host of facilities that provide passengers with everything they need to have a comfortable stay. Tel: +65 6507 9788. Email: enquiry@harilelahospitality.com

title: Parking
description:
Terminal 1 Car Park
More information

title: Parking
description:
Terminal 2 Car Park
More information

title: Rail
description: The train station is accessible by foot from Terminal 2 or Terminal 3.

title: Rail
description: Airport to city - To get to the city, transfer to the westbound train at Tanah Merah station. The last train that connects to the last westbound train at Tanah Merah station leaves Changi Airport station at 11.18pm. All the trains and gantries at the stations are luggage-friendly.

title: Rail
description: City to airport - To get to Changi, transfer to the eastbound train at Tanah Merah station. The first train arrives at Changi Airport station at 5.26am from Monday to Saturday, and at 5.54am on Sundays and public holidays.

title: Rail
description: A single ride ticket can be purchased at train stations. A stored-value EZ-Link card for multiple rides can also be purchased from train stations or any Changi Recommends store.

title: Wine & Spirits by DFS
description: A wide selection of some of the world's most premium wines and spirits are available here, including Johnny Walker Red Label Scotch, Hennessy XO Grand Champagne, Camus L'Elegant, Chivas Regal, Martell Cordon Bleu and Absolut Vodka.

title: Wine & Spirits by DFS
description: A wide selection of some of the world's most premium wines and spirits are available here, including Johnny Walker Red Label Scotch, Hennessy XO Grand Champagne, Camus L'Elegant, Chivas Regal, Martell Cordon Bleu and Absolut Vodka.

title: Harrods
description: From its origins as a tea merchant and grocer, Harrods has grown into a world-renowned name in luxury retail. Synonymous with high quality and style, Harrods at Changi Airport offers a selection of branded accessories and luxury products including food and drink, which are unique to Harrods.

title: The Chocolatier
description: The Chocolatier is an exciting new multi-brand confectionery concept that offers a massive range of Premium, Kids and all the Worlds' Favourites. The store is a delight for serious chocolate lovers and also offers a wide range of candy and gourmet local delights and with great services providing all that is needed for the perfect gift including free gift wrapping.

title: Fashion Avenue
description: Spread over 4,000 square feet, Fashion Avenue features an impressive portfolio of the world's most sought after designer brands. You'll find the likes of Salvatore Ferragamo, Bally, Dunhill, Loewe, YSL, Chloe, Armani Jeans, Michael Kors and Tumi. It's the perfect place to indulge your sense of style.

title: Times Travel
description: From books and gifts to travelling needs, Times Travel stocks a wide range of travel fiction, language guides and travel necessities. Its shelves are filled with international best sellers, hot-off-the-press dailies such as the New York Times, Le Monde and The Daily Telegraph, as well as the one-of-a-kind Berlitz Listening Station to help create a more interactive way of learning new languages.

title: Taxis and Public Transportation
description:
Buses Airport to city: Take public bus service 36/36A to the city. The first bus arrives at around 6.00am and the last leaves just before midnight. A single fare costs below $2 and the ride takes about an hour. Bus stops are located at the basement bus bays of Terminals 1, 2 and 3. Please prepare the exact fare as no change will be given. Alternatively, a stored-value EZ-Link card for multiple rides can be purchased from any Changi Recommends store or the Changi Airport train station.
City to airport: Public buses stop at Terminals 1, 2 and 3. A single fare from the city via public bus service 36 costs below $2 and the ride takes about an hour. Please prepare the exact fare as no change will be given. Alternatively, a stored-value EZ-Link card for multiple rides can be purchased from any Changi Recommends store or the Changi Airport train station. More information
Taxis: Taxis are available at the taxi stands at the Arrival levels of each Terminal. A ride to the city takes about 30 minutes and costs between $20 and $40. Fares are metered and there is an additional Airport surcharge for all trips originating from the Airport:
$5 Airport surcharge: 5.00pm - midnight (Fri - Sun)
$3 Airport surcharge: All other times
Midnight surcharge of 50% of final metered fare: midnight - 6.00am
Peak hours surcharge of 25% of final metered fare: 6.00am - 9.30am (Mon - Fri) and 6.00pm - midnight (Mon - Sun)

title: Wi-Fi
description: Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the airport. Easy-to-login WiFi service in the transit areas of Changi Airport with #WiFi@Changi. Simply launch your internet browser (e.g Safari, Chrome, Internet Explorer) and key in a valid website address to access the login page. Next, enter your mobile number to receive a One-Time-Password via SMS or obtain a temporary WiFi mobile number from the airport information counter / WiFi kiosks in the gatehold room. Finally, key in the provided one-time authentication number to start surfing.
